articles.title: Netherlands to host New Zealand for two T20Is in August - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: It continues NZ's long trip across Europe, following up from tours to England, Scotland and Ireland

articles.title: China tells EU it will pursue Ukraine peace in its own way - The Sun Daily
